name: Military Press with EZ-Bar
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding an EZ bar with your hands positioned slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

2. Engage your core and maintain a straight back throughout the exercise.

3. Press the bar upwards towards the ceiling by extending your arms fully, keeping your elbows at about a 90-degree angle or slightly below.

4. Lower the bar to ear height by bending your elbows, keeping control of the movement throughout.

5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: A shoulder exercise that involves lifting an EZ bar straight up and lowering it back down using primarily the muscles in your shoulders
